bill_title: provide for the disposal of the Napa Junction to Platte segment of the state-owned rail system.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide for the disposal of the Napa Junction to Platte segment of the state-owned rail system. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. The Department of Transportation and the South Dakota State Railroad Board shall provide for the sale of 82.4 miles of state-owned railway line and adjacent railroad property from Napa Junction to Platte. Prior to the sale, the department and board shall provide for the removal of the rail, ties, and other track material. Any revenue from the salvage of the railway line shall be deposited in railroad trust fund. The sale shall be pursuant to § 1-44-28. 180 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.063 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
